result.execSummary:
Anthony L. RUSSELL was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Anthony L. RUSSELL was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Anthony L. RUSSELL

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.   
The parties have received warrants from both Governors.   
Defendant is now waiving his right to an Extradition hearing given the evidence presented.  Court finds sufficient grounds to extradite the defendant to Anderson, Indiana.   
Minutes.

The State of Indiana wants the defendant.
Attorney Scharenbroch states the defendant is not ready to waive extradition, requests a governors warrant and requests that bail be set.
Attorney Vendetti objects to any bail.
The Court finds that bail is not appropriate in this matter and will not set any bail.
Status conference is set for 08-21-15 at 11:30 a.m.
Minutes.
